item.description:
We're meeting at Dalat!! It's a tasty Vietnamese place with good prices and some yummy vegan options. This meetup lunch will also serve as a meeting for a group of us that are tyring to get the City of Worcester to place a citywide ban on animal acts used for entertainment. The focus is on Ringling Circus which comes to Worcester twice a year.

I forgot to mention that if you have any questions you can reach me at 508-410-3172.

See you all soon!!

Stephen
item.how_to_find_us: Dreads, glasses and a whole lot of veganess ;)
item.name: Worcester Vegan MeetUp & EatUp June Meeting
